title: Coronation Street Alan Halsall on age gap with girlfriend Tisha Merry
text:
(Picture: Alan Halsall/Instagram)

Coronation Street star Alan Halsall has taken a light hearted poke at the ten-year age gap between himself and his girlfriend and former cobbles colleague Tisha Merry. Alan, best known as amiable mechanic Tyrone Dobbs in the soap, shared beauty treatments he was receiving on his Instagram Stories and captioned it with: ‘The s**t ya have to do when your girlfriends 10 years younger than you!! @missdrewmerry93 (sic).’

The 37-year-old actor was seen donning anti wrinkle patches below his eyes and made the joke about Tisha, who used to play Steph Britton in the show. Alan and Tisha went public with their romance in May at his co-star Sam Aston (Chesney Brown) and Briony Aston’s wedding, and the pair’s friends were relieved they no longer had to keep their romance a secret.

Alan was previously married to Lucy-Jo Hudson but the pair split after nine years of marriage. The former couple have six-year-old daughter Sienna-Rae together.

But she clearly has other motives as she has been plotting against Fiz, something which will undoubtedly cause friction and dramatic scenes for Alan to portray.

Amid that,. he is also heavily rumoured to be one of the contestants on this year’s I’m A Celebrity Get Me Out Of Here! following in the footsteps of co-star Jennie. This, however, is yet to be confirmed.

Alan regularly shares snaps of himself with Tisha on Instagram with co-stars and fans responding to the loved up pair with love heart emojis and positive comments.

Coronation Street fans can usually catch Alan on the Street on Monday, Wednesday and Friday evenings but there’s a bit of a Corrie drought right now as football has led to the soap being taken off the air until Wednesday 16 October.
